Test Name: PHENOSENSE COMBINATION HIV DRUG RESISTANCE ASSAY
Purpose: To profile HIV drug resistance by performing the PHENOSENSE Combination assay with accurate and reproducible results.
Container: Not specified in SOP (5 mL plasma required)
Equipment: PHENOSENSE Combination HIV Drug Resistance Assay Kit, calibrated pipettes, centrifuge, −70 °C freezer, room-temperature incubator, analytical instrument specified in kit, temperature/humidity monitors
